parameters.query: SELECT hs_internal_name, column_db, data_type, sync_enabled FROM public.hubspot_properties WHERE hs_object = 'contacts' AND sync_enabled = true ORDER BY hs_internal_name
SELECT max(lastmodifieddate) as last_sync_date FROM public.contacts
SELECT DISTINCT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'public' AND table_name = 'contacts'

INSERT INTO public.sync_status
(object_type, sync_start_time, status, created_at, updated_at, columns_created)
VALUES
('contacts', NOW(), 'completed', NOW(), NOW(), {{ $('Check Missing Columns').last().json.total_missing || 0 }})
